name: David Anthony ADKINS, as Administrator of the Estate of Susan Kent and Gary Gouge, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Respondent

parties: David Anthony ADKINS, as Administrator of the Estate of Susan Kent and Gary Gouge, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 4th day of June, 1998, the petition for allowance of appeal is GRANTED; the order of the Commonwealth Court is REVERSED; and this matter is REMANDED to the Court of Common Pleas of Chester County consistent with this court’s opinion in Marino v. Hackman, 551 Pa. 369, 710 A.2d 1108 (Pa.) and Jacobs v. Halloran, 551 Pa. 350, 710 A.2d 1098 (Pa.) (1998).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
711 A.2d 469
David Anthony ADKINS, as Administrator of the Estate of Susan Kent and Gary Gouge, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 4, 1998.
